Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ["Wait, so Kowloong people eat noodles with chopsticks? But I don't know how to use chopsticks. How am I supposed to eat this?", 'Dear customer, please respect the differences in dining cultures. You can order a disposable fork and knife if you need one.']

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ['I ordered nine sweet dumplings but got ten.', 'Never had a bad review complaining about getting free stuff.']

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ["The food's okay, but why is your rice so dry?", 'You ordered crispy rice.']

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ['I ordered chili mian. The problem is, where is the "mian," the noodles?', 'Hello, the "chili mian" in Kowloong cuisine is a type of chili-based seasoning that does not contain noodles.']

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ['The porcelain bowls I bought from you are all full of crack marks, like they were glued back together.', 'Dear customer, this is ice-crack pattern porcelain, a classical Kowloong technique.']

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ["Oh my goodness! I mean, you Kowloong people actually eat rice with raw eggs? I really want to kick your chef's butt with my boot!", 'Dear customer, onsen egg is soft-boiled egg.']

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ['This tofu is way too spicy!!', "You ordered extra spicy mapo tofu. It's normal that it tastes this spicy."]

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ['I ordered only one roasted duck. Why are there four legs in there!', 'Dear customer, the two small ones are duck wings.']

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ['I said no spice for the diced chicken! Why is it still spicy?', "Dear customer, what you ordered is spicy diced chicken. There's really no way to make it without spice."]

Desc: Kowloong Chamber of Commerce Sudden Event
OptionDescs: ["Isn't this grass jelly just a bowl of sugar water? Where's my grass jelly?", 'When grass jelly becomes liquid when heated.']
['The hummus was all spilled!!', 'For delivery issues, please contact the drone delivery department. We are only responsible for food preparation.']

['The fragrance is way too strong. I applied just a few drops and the entire Commercial District can smell it.', "Our fragrances are all handcrafted using traditional Akdilek techniques. If it doesn't meet your expectation, you can watch the complimentary terminal tutorial and use it after proper dilution."]
['They refused to deliver my food. Bad review.', 'Dear customer, free flatbread ordered alone is not eligible for delivery.']

["Your dates are way too bitter. They're not sweet at all.", "Our dates are all grown in space greenhouses. The poor taste might be due to temperature control errors. Thank you for your feedback. We'll improve our cultivation process as soon as possible."]
["They didn't read my notes. Fine, I'm leaving a bad review.", 'The customer requested all our staff to sing birthday wishes to him. We apologize, but that is not among our services.']
['Why does the camel toy I bought only have one hump?', 'Not all camels have two humps. There are camels with just one hump as well.']

['Your grilled meat rice is bland. Did you put nothing but salt on the meat?', 'To recreate authentic Akdilek traditional flavors, we didn\'t add seasonings other than salt to the "Classic Grilled Meat Rice" you ordered. In case you have specific taste preferences, please order other dishes.']
['This grilled meat paste skewer looks way too unappetizingâ€”just looking at it kills my appetite!', 'Dear customer, please respect the dietary cultures of different regions.']
["Why won't the Asslam train model I bought run?", 'Please check if batteries are installed.']

["You shortchanged me! There's no lemon juice in my tomato lemon salad! I have photos as proof!", 'Dear customer, the lemon juice was already drizzled on when we prepared your dish. Please take a closer look at the photos you took.']

["I sprayed the Construct fragrance on myself, but it didn't work at all.", 'You confirmed with us that you were human before shipping. You knew it was Construct-exclusive fragrance, so why would you use it on yourself?']
["Why isn't the pizza cut? This is ridiculous! How are we three people supposed to share it?", "Dear customer, what you ordered is a Catania-style single-serving pizza, which normally isn't cut."]
['The fries came without ketchup.', 'We sincerely apologize for the poor dining experience. Ketchup needs to be purchased separately.']
['First time it was delicious. Second time it was bad, a bit too salty.', 'Face cream is not edible.']
["This store's skincare products are all so expensive.", "Dear customer, please check the prices before purchase and don't leave negative reviews after placing your order."]

["The Bio-Whale M9's head receptor has completely abandoned the original M7 design. Do you people even understand what makes bio-whales appealing for real?", 'We have relayed your feedback directly to our design department. Thank you for your passion for the bio-whale series.']

["This store's VR equipment has issues with the emergency exit function! I got stuck in a horror game for three hours. Oh my god, can you imagine that?", 'We have contacted repair technicians to provide on-site service. We sincerely apologize for this poor experience!']

['Your prime super burger is as tall as a water cup! It nearly dislocated my jaw!', "Dear customer, we apologize, but our prime super burger's height is precisely its selling point. Please eat it layer by layer when dining."]

["I bought a bunch of random cosmetics just to meet the minimum order for this bio-whale model, but ended up getting the wrong version. I'm really bummed out, so I have to leave a bad review. Please understand.", 'Completely incomprehensible.']

['I ordered ten Post-Impressionist holographic artworks, but there were two Symbolic Abstract pieces in there. Do you art sellers even understand art?', "We sincerely apologize for this poor experience. Through investigation, we found that it was caused by our packaging machinery's ambiguous definitions for art movement classifications. We have thus initiated a refund process for you."]
['The ice cream arrived cold. How am I supposed to eat this?', '?']
['Bought several bottles of signature drinks, but they came without a bottle opener.', "We sincerely apologize, but we don't include bottle openers unless specifically requested in order notes."]
['I said I wanted a hot drink! Hot drink! Is it hard to understand?', 'I said we only sell cold drinks. Cold drinks.']

["The size 44 polar mountaineering boots I bought just don't fit.", 'Our products are manufactured strictly according to Babylonia market standards. Should you require refund or exchange services, please kindly do so through after-sales channels before directly giving a bad review.']

['Why are you still selling old game discs like "Escape from Kyaranta" for such high prices? Do people actually buy this stuff? Hilarious.', 'We are not responsible for game pricing. Please direct price-related negative reviews to the game publisher.']

["The straw for the fruit tea is too big! It can't fit into the cup!", "Dear customer, you can't suck up the fruit pieces through the small straw. The large straw needs to be inserted in the center."]

["Bought two bags of fresh produce, but they're not fresh at all. They already smell bad after just two days.", "Would you dare to eat any fresh produce that doesn't smell bad after sitting for two days?"]
['First time eating chocolate this bitter. How can something this bitter not even have a warning note?', "The dark chocolate you purchased is O'zera 97.7%. It's normal that it tastes bitter."]

["I bought a Russian black bread here and dueled my friend's baguette with it. The bread got smashed and I ended up in the hospital.", 'Dear customer, please do not use our food products to participate in fights.']

["I bought a nesting doll from you, but there's only one big doll. Where are the small ones? This is ridiculous. I'm speechless.", "Dear customer, we sell nesting dolls individually. If you'd like to purchase the complete set, please buy the nesting doll set package."]
